Hello {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting us. My name is Xxx_Name_xxX, with the Fluence Customer Experience team. I'm sorry to hear you are experiencing issues with your light! In order to best assist you with your warranty claim, please provide me with a brief description of the issue and as much of the following information as possible.
• Name • Address • Order Number (if possible) • Serial Number of affected light(s) • Number of affected lights
If you are having difficulty locating the serial number on your fixture, it can be located on either the power supply or the fixture itself. Once we have the information needed I will be able to process your warranty claim. If you have any additional questions please don't hesitate to ask!
